result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher L Garrett was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Christopher L Garrett is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Christopher L Garrett was found guilty of Contact after Domestic Abuse Arrest [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 968.075(5)(a)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Christopher L Garrett in court.  Attorney Dailey Johnson in court for Christopher L Garrett.  Attorney Benjamin Wagner in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count 3.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 

On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count # 1 and 2   . 

Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT #  3
Court withholds sentence and places the Defendant on Probation for  2 years  , cc to 21CM1625

-Restitution filed by State/No objection by Defense. 
-DOC DV treatment
-Provide DNA sample
-Any other conditions DOC may impose

COURT COSTS:
Ct # 3
-DA surcharge-remitted
- All CC and DNA surcharge waived. V/W surcharge due on probation

-Days credit if revoked: 3 days
